passive.name: Rough Water
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. The Break DMG dealt by the wearer ignores <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> of the target's DEF. When the wearer's Break Effect in battle is at {{2}}% or greater, increases their SPD by <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong>.
